docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

I like to drink after I play

docs.title: Actor two
docs.text:
sequenceDiagram
    Participant Cloud
    actor User as Local System
    actor Server as Web Server

    Cloud->>Server: Geojson
    User->>Server: Request File
    Server-->>User: Deliver File

docs.title: Test
docs.text:
graph TD
    subgraph Cloud["☁️ Internet Cloud"]
        A[File Storage]
    end
    A --> B[Local System]

    classDef cloud fill:#f3f4f6,stroke:#b4b4b4,stroke-width:2px,rx:10px,ry:10px;
    class Cloud cloud;

docs.title: Dfd1
docs.text:
graph TB
sq[Square shape] --> ci((Circle shape))

    subgraph A
        od>Odd shape]-- Two line<br/>edge comment --> ro
        di{Diamond with <br/> line break} -.-> ro(Rounded<br>square<br>shape)
        di==>ro2(Rounded square shape)
    end

    %% Notice that no text in shape are added here instead that is appended further down
    e --> od3>Really long text with linebreak<br>in an Odd shape]

    %% Comments after double percent signs
    e((Inner / circle<br>and some odd <br>special characters)) --> f(,.?!+-*ز)

    cyr[Cyrillic]-->cyr2((Circle shape Начало));

     classDef green fill:#9f6,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px;
     classDef orange fill:#f96,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px;
     class sq,e green
     class di orange

    A --> C[Build System<img src='../../assets/solid/envelope.svg' width='25' height='25' />]

docs.title: Role flow
docs.text:
flowchart LR

A[/Sys Admin\]--->Z[(DB)]-->B
D[/Other Role\]-->W[Web App]-->UDB[(user DB)]-->B
B(Second process)

docs.title: Seq1
docs.text:
sequenceDiagram
    Alice ->> Bob: Hello Bob, how are you?
    Bob-->>John: How about you John?
    Bob--x Alice: I am good thanks!
    Bob-x John: I am good thanks!
    Note right of John: Bob thinks a long<br/>long time, so long<br/>that the text does<br/>not fit on a row.

    Bob-->Alice: Checking with John...
    Alice->John: Yes... John, how are you?
